definitions.definition: A dense, plain woven cloth, usually made of cotton or a cotton blend .
A fine smooth-faced woolen cloth for men’s garments, usually of double width (i.e., a yard and a half); so called in distinction from woolens three quarters of a yard wide.

main_definition: A dense, plain woven cloth, usually made of cotton or a cotton blend .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A fine smooth-faced woolen cloth for men’s garments, usually of double width (i.e., a yard and a half); so called in distinction from woolens three quarters of a yard wide.
